fr.lri.swingstates.gestures

Class Gesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.gestures.Gesture

  • public class Gesture
extends java.lang.Object
    A gesture, i.e. a vector of points with their input time.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

        public Gesture addPoint(double x,
               double y)
        Adds a point to this gesture.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point to add.
        y - The y coordinate of the point to add.
        Returns:
        This gesture.

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getEnd()

        The last point of this gesture, null if this gesture is empty.

      • asPolyLine

        public CPolyLine asPolyLine()
        Returns:
        a graphical representation of this gesture as a CPolyLine.

      • getPointTimes

        public java.util.Vector<java.lang.Long> getPointTimes()
        Returns:
        the input time for all points in this gesture.

      • getMin

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getMin()
        Returns:
        The upper left point of this gesture's bounding box.

      • getMax

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getMax()
        Returns:
        The lower right point of this gesture's bounding box.
